name: Eagle Shot Golf
overview:
An arcade golfing game developed and published by American Sammy in 1994.

The game has you playing traditional golf on three different fields which have the Beginner, Amateur and Pro skill levels respectively. Up to four players (turn-based) can participate. You choose one out of four golf players each with a different set of golf parameters, which determine their style of golf play. Next you choose the club you wish to join. Once your options are configured you try to make as few tee shots as possible to get the ball in the hole to for a winning streak. During the gameplay, the player chooses the stance, the type of golf club, the direction and the power of striking and then times the hit on the ball. Wind direction and speed affect where the ball will fly and land.
